title: Information: Asking for Assistance (Usefulness 10)
description: Traveler usefulness 10/10 phrases for the Asking for Assistance subcategory within Information. Includes 1 card(s).

cards.english: Do you have an English information guide?
cards.romaji: Eigo no gaido wa arimasu ka?
cards.japanese: 英語のガイドはありますか？
